name: Gondor
description: Gondor is the most prominent kingdom of Men in Middle-earth.

name: Mordor
description: Mordor is a black, volcanic plain located in the southeast of Middle-earth to the East of Gondor, Ithilien and the great river Anduin.

name: Rivendell
description: Also known as Imladris, is an Elven town and the house of Elrond located in Middle-earth.
